header.title: Topic Preview for Top Five
header.description:
Gives the Topic Preview effect to the Top Five MOD
* All changes will be made to Top Five MOD files. Please back up your original files before modifying them. ** Topic Preview's "jQuery Topic Preview" theme will not work with Top Five. Only the default native Topic Preview functionality will work with Top Five.
header.author-notes: Requirements: You must already have installed "Top Five v1.0.1d" and "Topic Preview 2.0.2" on your forum.
